item.description:
Come join us for some fun!

June will be hosting a Poker and game night at her house in Holbrook on Saturday night, February 6th.

Here are the details:

*BYOB
*We will order out for pizza or chinese or both
*June will provide some munchies like chips and dip but feel free to bring something else to share
*Sue will provide the poker chips
*If I can find my Right-Left-Center game I will bring it...if anyone else has it can you bring it?

Hope to see some of you there..........Come to socialize even if you don't play!
Winter is getting boring!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Poker and Game Night
